headline: Opinion: Editorial Cartoons for May, 2025 - The Globe and Mail
context: As The Globe's consumer affairs reporter, Mariya follows national and business news and how companies and government are impacting Canadian consumers.

annotations.paragraph: On June 9th, The Globe will present INTERSECT/25, where business leaders and policy experts will come together to propose the paths to a more prosperous Canada.
